</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the phase of the in-game Moon on the given date in range 0...1, where 0 - new Moon, 1 - full Moon. According to this command the fullest Moon in Arma 3 at midnight is on <tt>[[setDate]] [4804,7,13,0,0];</tt> Use [[Arma_3_Utilities#Moon_Phases|Moon Phase Utility]] to find out date for a mission with desired moon.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_currentMoonPhase = [[moonPhase]] [[date]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>// Returns array of dates for given year when moon is at its fullest
fnc_fullMoonDates = 
{
	[[private]] _year = [[param]] [0, 2035];
	[[private]] ["_date", "_phase", "_fullMoonDate"];
	[[private]] _fullMoonPhase = 1;
	[[private]] _waxing = [[false]];
	[[private]] _fullMoonDates = [];
	[[for]] "_i" [[from]] [[dateToNumber]] [_year, 1, 1, 0, 0] [[to]] [[dateToNumber]] [_year, 12, 31, 23, 59] [[step]] 1 / 365 [[do]]
	{
		_date = [[numberToDate]] [_year, _i];
		_phase = [[moonPhase]] _date;
		[[call]]
		{
			[[if]] (_phase > _fullMoonPhase) [[exitWith]]
			{
				_waxing = [[true]];
				_fullMoonDate = _date;
			};
			[[if]] (_waxing) [[exitWith]] 
			{
				_waxing = [[false]];
				_fullMoonDates [[pushBack]] _fullMoonDate;
			};
		};
		_fullMoonPhase = _phase;
	};
	_fullMoonDates
};

//set random full moon date in year 1970
[[setDate]] [[selectRandom]] (1970 [[call]] fnc_fullMoonDates);</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
